objects.name: Instructions
objects.string:
Touch, Left Mouse or Space to attach rope.  

Then release!

Try to get to the finish on the right.

Press to Start

events.name: Change the zoom on the background so it matches the main game size.
Touch the screen to start the game
When touched attach a rope to nearest swingbox (group)
When released remove rope and unlink Main Character

events.comment: Did we drop off screen? Restart!
